name: Octorok Wars!
description:
Play as an Octorok in the war to come and prepare yourself to become the ultimate Octorok in this hellish battlezone.

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Spacebar to jump.
  • Mouse Left click to shoot.
  • Mouse Right click to stop time.

Some tips for the beginner Octorok:

  • Look at the cannon! Try to aim a little lower!
  • ABUSE the stop time mechanic! Right Click!
  • Use the recoil of your shots to reposition yourself.
  • Jump! Jump! Jump!
  • Try to battle in the Ammo Zone if you are low on ammo.
